about_the_game:
Welcome to Hydra Lists! This program will help you create and organize your roll tables for all of your table top needs. Your roll tables can reference each other, allowing you to create interesting and detailed results instantly.

For example, if you wanted to easily make random characters, you could link a first name list, personality list, and an occupation list together to create a fully fleshed out character in the blink of an eye.

.

Since there is no limit to how many lists you can link, you can create complex lists referencing lists to get all kind of results, like in this case the outline of a family house.



With steam workshop support, you can upload your libraries of lists for others to use or download lists to save yourself time making them.

Feature Overview:

  • Link lists together through references, allowing you to design unique and interesting roll tables that can pull results from other lists.
  • Incorporate formulas into your lists. These formulas can be as simple or as complex as you like. Let the program do the calculation work!
  • Once you make a list, simply press a button and get the randomly generated result. Tired of clicking? You can generate dozens to hundreds of results from a list.
  • Export your lists into a multiple page PDF file with special coloring for different lists for you to use offline or to show to others.
  • Want to keep it simple? You can export your content to a text file instead!
  • Organize your books into Libraries, allowing you to better keep track of your content
  • Want to share with others? You can export and import libraries to files, or upload your lists to the Steam Workshop and let others see your work.
  • Minor utilities such as a dice roller that can incorporate formulas and an initiative tracker to help keep the game flowing
  • Support for international keyboards. This is based on your operating systems language setting
  • Support for letters and symbols in other languages, such as Português, Español, and 中国人
  • Labels in several native languages, with more languages being added each update
  • A Help Menu, containing video tutorials to walk you through how the program works

Art assets done by Hoshi Tora
detailed_description:
Welcome to Hydra Lists! This program will help you create and organize your roll tables for all of your table top needs. Your roll tables can reference each other, allowing you to create interesting and detailed results instantly.

For example, if you wanted to easily make random characters, you could link a first name list, personality list, and an occupation list together to create a fully fleshed out character in the blink of an eye.

.

Since there is no limit to how many lists you can link, you can create complex lists referencing lists to get all kind of results, like in this case the outline of a family house.



With steam workshop support, you can upload your libraries of lists for others to use or download lists to save yourself time making them.

Feature Overview:

  • Link lists together through references, allowing you to design unique and interesting roll tables that can pull results from other lists.
  • Incorporate formulas into your lists. These formulas can be as simple or as complex as you like. Let the program do the calculation work!
  • Once you make a list, simply press a button and get the randomly generated result. Tired of clicking? You can generate dozens to hundreds of results from a list.
  • Export your lists into a multiple page PDF file with special coloring for different lists for you to use offline or to show to others.
  • Want to keep it simple? You can export your content to a text file instead!
  • Organize your books into Libraries, allowing you to better keep track of your content
  • Want to share with others? You can export and import libraries to files, or upload your lists to the Steam Workshop and let others see your work.
  • Minor utilities such as a dice roller that can incorporate formulas and an initiative tracker to help keep the game flowing
  • Support for international keyboards. This is based on your operating systems language setting
  • Support for letters and symbols in other languages, such as Português, Español, and 中国人
  • Labels in several native languages, with more languages being added each update
  • A Help Menu, containing video tutorials to walk you through how the program works

name: Hydra Lists: Roll Table Maker

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Hydra Lists: Roll Table Maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel or AMD with 1GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Hydra Lists is a roll table creator that allows you to link together lists to create complex and interesting results. Share your lists on the steam workshop or download lists that others have created.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Simplified Chinese
